articles.title: Parts of Boston Harbor meet shellfish consumption standards for first time in 100 years, state says
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> The state's Division of Marine Fisheries is in the process of reclassifying parts of the outer Boston Harbor so that shellfish will be allowed for direct human consumption.

The post Parts of Boston Harbor meet shellfish consumption standards for first time in 100 years, state says appeared first on Boston.com.
